success.title: Registration Successful!
success.message: Your account has been created successfully. You can now log in to access your account and start using our services.
success.additionalInfo: If you have any questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to contact our support team.

whoare.heading: Get to Know Malath
whoare.subheading: Your Trusted Partner in Business, Marketing & Investment
whoare.description: At Malath, we provide integrated outsourcing solutions for entrepreneurs, startups, and investors across Saudi Arabia and Egypt. We help our clients streamline operations, scale confidently, and focus on what matters most — growth and innovation.

about.visionDescription: To become the top destination for entrepreneurs and investors in the Arab world who seek professional, fully integrated remote business management solutions.
about.missionDescription: To deliver high-quality, reliable services in management, marketing, investment, and project oversight — through a dedicated team focused on every detail that leads to big success.
about.valuesDescription: At Malath, we are committed to a set of fundamental values that define how we serve and partner with our clients:
about.supportMessage: We are passionate about supporting entrepreneurs and businesses with
about.supportHighlight: smart, reliable solutions to streamline operations and achieve sustainable growth.

pros.title: Why Choose Malath?
points: We have deep insights into both local and regional markets
We offer flexible, customizable solutions tailored to each business
We prioritize quality and speed in every project we handle
Our team brings diverse, cross-industry expertise
We believe our success begins with the success of our clients

footer.slogan: Your most trusted & highly adaptable partner for business, marketing, and investment solutions.
footer.address: Address: 20 Al-Tayaran Street, First Floor, Apartment 2

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description_line1: Let's take your business to the next level.
contact.description_line2: Reach out to our team – we're here to support, advise, and grow with you.
contact.validation_error: Please fill in all required fields.
